messages.subject: Dear Steven
messages.body:
From: john peter
RUE 25 MACCORY
ABIDJAN-COTE D'IVOIRE.
WEST AFRICA
 
Dear,steven
  
My name is john peter from Sierra Leonian. I am 20 years old and a student.  Please I would like you to assist me as urgent as you can,before they kill me.My father is a wealthy cocoa merchant.Trouble began early last two year when  my father's associates began suspecting that my father is not givingn proper accounts of all the tonnes of cocoa being cultivated by local farmersn in  some villages.
 
This mistrust deepens between Oct-Sept, 2005 when they discovered avery large some of money my father deposited with a Bank here in ABIDJAN-COTE D'IVOIRE (FORMALLY IVORY COAST in West Africa. As a result of this discovery  and the envy on the money he was poisioned by his associates.At his hospital bed ,he revealed to me the reasons of his sickness and directed me where to get the documents of the said deposit which he made on my name as the next of kin,being the only child.
He dvised me that in case  he die, that I should not stay in this country Sierre Leone because his associates will equally kill me hence my mother had died five years ago of  breast cancer.He also instructed that if he dies, I should look for a foreign partner who  will help me to transfer the money out of this place (Abidjan Cote d'Ivoire), to his account and the person will help me to invest the money in that country. Based on this, I had to contact you bearing in mind that you will be humane enough to protect my life. My father finally died on the 5th of june,2006  and since then, I was out of school and went into hiding because of my father's asociates. All the relevant documents of the $8.000,000.(Eight  Million United States Dollars) that was deposited in a Commercial Bank by my  late father, are with  me now.
 
I will give you 15% of the total money, if you can help me transferring it  into your Account, for onward investment in your  country. Please contact me  immediately with the above E-mail address and include your telephone and Fax  numbers to enable me send you all necessar documents asregards the money  before they kill me. It is a risk free transaction. 

I'm waiting for your urgent reply.
Best regards.sincerely,
 John peter
messages.raw:
John Peter

ABIDJAN-COTE D'IVOIRE.
WEST AFRICA

Dear,steven

My name is john peter from Sierra Leonian. I am 20 years old and a student. Please I would like you to assist me as urgent as you can,before they kill me.My father is a wealthy cocoa merchant.Trouble began early last two year when my father's associates began suspecting that my father is not givingn proper accounts of all the tonnes of cocoa being cultivated by local farmersn in some villages.

This mistrust deepens between Oct-Sept, 2005 when they discovered avery large some of money my father deposited with a Bank here in ABIDJAN-COTE D'IVOIRE (FORMALLY IVORY COAST in West Africa. As a result of this discovery and the envy on the money he was poisioned by his associates.At his hospital bed ,he revealed to me the reasons of his sickness and directed me where to get the documents of the said deposit which he made on my name as the next of kin,being the only child. He dvised me that in case he die, that I should not stay in this country Sierre Leone because his associates will equally kill me hence my mother had died five years ago of breast cancer.He also instructed that if he dies, I should look for a foreign partner who will help me to transfer the money out of this place (Abidjan Cote d'Ivoire), to his account and the person will help me to invest the money in that country. Based on this, I had to contact you bearing in mind that you will be humane enough to protect my life. My father finally died on the 5th of june,2006 and since then, I was out of school and went into hiding because of my father's asociates. All the relevant documents of the $8.000,000.(Eight Million United States Dollars) that was deposited in a Commercial Bank by my late father, are with me now.

I will give you 15% of the total money, if you can help me transferring it into your Account, for onward investment in your country. Please contact me immediately with the above E-mail address and include your telephone and Fax numbers to enable me send you all necessar documents asregards the money before they kill me. It is a risk free transaction.

I'm waiting for your urgent reply.
Best regards.sincerely,
John peter

messages.subject: Dear Stevieperv Rammer
messages.body:
Received: from  [

Dear Stevieperv Rammer ,
 
I thank you for your concern and willingness to assist me in this present predicaments of life and i pray that God will give you the wisdom and courage to execute this project judiciously. Presently i am in Abidjan Cote d Ivoire and the money is deposited with a bank here know as Standard Credit Union Bank.I want you to contact the bank as my late father foreign associate whom the fund deposited with them by my late Father should be transfer to an account.I will go and submit your name to the bank and confirm you as my late father foreign associate so reply me with your full name .Below is the contact of the bank,
 
Name:Standard Credit Union Bank Abidjan CI.
Tel:22524000133 Fax:22522473882
Director Foreign Remittance Dept
Contact Person:Dr Benneth Hunter
Email:bennethhunterstcub@banknoteclub.com or drbennethhunter@yahoo.com
 
You should contact the bank and give them any information they want for the transfer.I hope and believe that my whole life and future is safe in your hands.
 
Awaiting your reply.
Remain Blessed.
Yours John

John Peter

messages.subject: Proceedures
messages.body:
Attn:Stevieperv  Rammer .
 
Dear Sir,
 
After due and satisfactory verification with your bank this honorable bank is now ready to proceed with other transfer formalities required for the smooth and succesful transfer of the said fund to your account. You are required to come down here within 7 days for the obtainment of affidavit of authorization and court mandimus to reactivate and legalise the transfer.This documentations from the high court is the only authorisation required to empower this bank to effect this transfer.
 
On the contrary you can employ the services of a resident attorney to represent you at the concern authority for the procurement of the necessary documents if you will not be able to come here with the stipulated time frame. We expects your maximum co operation to enable us move forward with the transfer.after transfer we shall find find some girls for you, you get back to me with your phone and fax number
 
Thanks.
Dr Benneth Hunter.
Director Foreign Remittance Dept.
Standard Credit Union Bank,Abidjan CI
